name: Jhankar Mahbub
reviewperson: Tesla's Model S was the first mass-market car to prove that EVs can be exciting to drive, viable as daily transportation, and usable for long trips. The Tesla Model X is very quick, fun to drive, and has impressive range, but the spartan cabin and steep price limit its appeal.

name: SaJeeb Ahmeed
reviewperson: Tesla has singlehandedly changed the electric-car landscape, and the 2021 Model 3 is the least expensive way to get one of these tech wonders in your driveway.The Model 3 is now Teslas most affordable model and has the range to convert electric-car skeptics

name: AGROHO
reviewperson: As the SUV cousin of the Model S sedan, the 2021 Tesla Model X might be the greenest—and one of the fastest—ways to tote up to seven people or lots of cargo .The Model S is an electric luxury sedan that makes many of its premium-badged rivals seem fussy and old fashioned.

name: Karina Islam
reviewperson: Among the more affordable options in the electric-vehicle marketplace, the Tesla Model 3 is arguably the one with the most name recognition.The Model X is futuristic and can be freakishly fast, but its interior lacks the panache and quality we expect of a luxury SUV in this price range.

name: Mark Otto
reviewperson: The latest from Tesla is the all-electric Model Y compact SUV, which shares its platform and most of its cabin with the Model 3 sedan but has more cargo space. The affordable and functional Model 3 will help Tesla push all-electric vehicles into the mainstream.

name: Chris JJ Mohamed
reviewperson: Touted to make its return to the lineup in 2023, the new Tesla Roadster picks up where the old model left off.With a long driving range and luxury marketing, the Tesla Model S has made electric vehicles desirable and motivated established automakers to build their own.

name: Mr Jhon Doe
reviewperson: Tesla has singlehandedly changed the electric-car landscape, and the Model 3 is the least expensive way to get one of the company's tech wonders in your driveway.Tesla's impact on America's automotive landscape was miniscule until the game-changing Model S sedan came along.

name: Fida
reviewperson: Tesla has singlehandedly changed the electric-car landscape, and the 2021 Model 3 is the least expensive way to get one of these tech wonders in your driveway.The Model 3 is now Teslas most affordable model and has the range to convert electric-car skeptics

name: Tuktuki
